name: Clone IBM-CAMHub-Open
description: Clone repositories in IBM-CAMHub-Open to customer-provided virtual machine.

metadata.longDescription: Clone all repositories in IBM-CAMHub-Open in github.com to a virtual machine that is owned and provided by customer.

bullets.title: Operating systems supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 and above
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and higher
CentOS 7 and higher

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
  • - Allow access from CAM;
  • - Allow access to Internet;
  • - Allow password authentication for SSH.
  • - Allow user NOPASSWD sudo access to yum or apt-get to install git and curl;
  • - Allow name resolution of internet hosts, specifically github.com;

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
• 1. Tools including curl and git will be installed in the virtual machine if they do not exist.
  • 2. Please log into the virtual machine to check out the repositories cloned.
